key.name: enable_facebook
key.value: Enable this setting to get feed from your Facebook account.

key.name: enable_twitter
key.value: Enable this setting to get feed from your Twitter account.

key.name: enable_linkedin
key.value: Enable this setting to get feed from your LinkedIn account.

key.name: auth_fb
key.value: Control who can see your Facebook's feeds.

key.name: auth_tw
key.value: Control who can see your Twitter's feeds.

key.name: auth_li
key.value: Control who can see your LinkedIn's feeds.

key.name: has_updated_their_extended_profile_data
key.value: has updated their extended profile data.

key.name: cron_job_user
key.value: Allow system to get feeds automation with Cron Job?

key.name: requires_configuration_message
key.value: Social Stream notices that Social Bridge 1.02 or later is not installed/active in your site. Facebook, Twitter and LinkedIn will not be supported if Social Bridge is not installed/active. For more information about Social Bridge, please visit our Knowledge Base.

key.name: max_validation_error_fb
key.value: Please pick a number between '1' and '999'

key.name: max_validation_error_li
key.value: Please pick a number between '1' and '20'

key.name: max_validation_error_tw
key.value: Please pick a number between '1' and '20'

key.name: admin_get_feed_cron
key.value: Allow system to get feeds automation with Cron Job?

key.name: admin_max_facebook_get_feed_label
key.value: Maximum Allowed Get Feed Per Times in Facebook

key.name: admin_max_facebook_get_feed
key.value: The maximum number of feeds will be get per times for 1 account (Enter a number between 1 and 999)

key.name: admin_max_twitter_get_feed_label
key.value: Maximum Allowed Get Feed Per Times in Twitter

key.name: admin_max_twitter_get_feed
key.value: The maximum number of feeds will be get per times for 1 account (Enter a number between 1 and 20) More Info: GET Statuses, User Timeline

key.name: admin_max_linkedin_get_feed_label
key.value: Maximum Allowed Get Feed Per Times in LinkedIn

key.name: admin_max_linkedin_get_feed
key.value: The maximum number of feeds will be get per times for 1 account (Enter a number between 1 and 20) More Info: Get Network Updates and Statistics API
